name: Since it is not always the same as above so below
name_original: Since it is not always the same as above so below
description:
Gameplay Instructions

Collect points by freeing the city from the AI, but be careful as it is not that simple, when you are in a state of ALERT "you cannot press any button" or you will die instantly, to ELIMINATE an AI you must be in the exact range besides pressing the button of the correct mouse LMB (left mouse button) for the green light, RMB (Right Mouse Button) for the red light.  Be focus, an incorrect input will cause you damage.

Since it is not always the same as above so below!

good luck!!!!!

Controls

PC

- WASD: movement

- Space Bar: Jump

- Space Bar in Air : Fly (double space bar)

- Shift: Run and accelerate

- Mouse: camera

- Left Mouse Click: Green Light Action

- Right Mouse Click: Red Light Action

- Exiting Game: Alt + F4

http://enriquesoto.ch/
